lines.gurmukhi: jw kY eyk Pn pY Drn hY so DrnIDr qwNih igrDr khY kaun bifAweI hY
lines.transliteration_english: Jaa Kai Ayk Dhan Pai Dharan Hai So Dharaneedhara , Taanhi Giradhar Kahai Kaoun Badiaaee Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: God created Sheshnag who is believed to be supporting the Earth on one of his thousand heads, and he is called Dharnidhar, and if his creator is called by the name of Girdhar (lifter of Goverdhan mountain-Krishan) what sort of praise is his?

lines.gurmukhi: jw ko eyk bwvro khwvq hY ibs√çnwQ qwih biRjnwQ khy kOn AiDkweI hY
lines.transliteration_english: Jaa Ko Ayk Baavaro Kahaavat Hai Bisvanaada , Taahi Brijanaad Kahay Kaoun Adhikaaee Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: The creator who has created a crazy (Shiv Ji) and is called Vishwanath (master of the Universe), if his creator is called Brijnath (master of Braj region-Sri Krishan) then what is so praiseworthy about him?

lines.gurmukhi: sgl Akwr ENkwr ky ibQwry ijn qwih nMd nMd khY kaun TkurweI hY
lines.transliteration_english: Sagal Akaar Aonkaar Kay Bidaaray Jina , Taahi Nand Nand Kahai Kaoun Tthakuraaee Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: The creator who has created this entire expanse, if that creator is called son of Nand-Krishan Ji, then what is so great about him?

lines.gurmukhi: ausqiq jwin inMdw krq AgRXwn AMD AYsy hI ArwDn qy mon suKdweI hY ]671]
lines.transliteration_english: Ousatati Jaani Nindaa Karat Agyaan Andha , Aisay Hee Araadhan Tay Mon Soukhadaaee Hai ?671?

Shabad OS B.translation: (So by such type of worship) ignorant and blind of knowledge consider Lord's worship being performed, but instead, they are slandering Him. Remaining silent is far better than this type of worship.  (671)
